name: Cosmic Cubes
description:
You've crash landed on a strange planet and have to find the parts to repair your ship so you can return home. However, you’ll soon  discover that perhaps there are some things that are beyond repair...

Global game jam page here: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/cosmic-cubes-0

Game made by:

Amanda Laven

Amanda Kirk

Chima Ngerem

Jordan Faas-Bush

For the 2020 Global Game Jam!
